questions.text: Why would an instructor like gruesome photos in a textbook?
questions.option4: That's what the students will see in the real world
questions.answer1: That's what the students will see in the real world
questions.answerDetails: The accuracy and detail of this book, combined with the graphic nature and number of photographs used in the case study approach, make it an attractive choice compared other books on this topic.
